mainDescription: Discover this exceptional 170 sqm villa located in the prestigious Khao Phra neighborhood. Comprising three luxurious suites, each with its own private bathroom, this home is designed to offer optimal comfort and complete privacy to its residents. Enjoy the spacious 100 sqm terrace, perfect for relaxation and outdoor gatherings, complete with a refreshing pool for sunny days. A 30 sqm sala provides additional space for relaxation or entertaining guests, while enjoying breathtaking views of the sea and Koh Phangan island, adding a touch of paradise to this exceptional residence. Just 3 minutes from Fisherman’s Village, you'll have quick access to local restaurants, shops, and entertainment, all while appreciating the calm and serenity of your home. Completion of construction is scheduled for late September 2024, allowing you ample time to prepare for your move into this dream property. Don't miss this unique opportunity to own a home in one of the island's most sought-after neighborhoods. For more information and to schedule a visit, feel free to contact us.
